Summary: Saw the strangest lights ever as I was leaving from Rachel , NV near Area 51.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Rachel
There were no other sightings in Rachel on or around September 30th 2001
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting DetailsSaw these yellowish lights to the north of the ET Highway, I believe east of Rachel, NV, disappear. I, at first, thought they went behind a hill or peak. I looked to check if there were any and there were not. Then I noticed a red light come out of them. Cannot recall if there were more than one light. That red light seemed to fade away as it came out of the brighter one. That went on a couple times and then the brighter one seemed to hover down the road and get brighter then disappeared. No sound was heard either. I wish I got the camera out. I was kind of taken back by this, but this was the highlight of checking out Area 51 for the first time. All under clear dark skies and, being an amateur astronomer, I have seen meteors and sateliites go across the sky but nothing like this!!
